name: UpRoot (itch) (jaugonza)
description:
You're a small insect trying to rise above ground, but climbing through the roots of a tree and evading enemies is hard!

Your objective is to go up, and you lose if you fall below the camera.

The player moves with the WASD keys and can jump with space. Pressing w attaches the player into a root if they were falling or jumping, and in order to jump, the player has to stop pressing w (or else they will attach themselves immediately back into the root).

Enemies move in vertical and horizontal directions and touching them will cause the player to lose control of the character.

As the camera scroll gets faster, the player shoud start to climb by jumping, instead of climbing. Going through one side teleports the player to the other one.
